nodes.text: A cave located on the planet Corellia was used as the base of operation of the cave-dwellers during the Galactic Civil War.
By the time of the Battle of Yavin, the cave was inhabited by the cave-dwellers, a Corellian group of anti-government criminals led by Raynod Menar.

Circa 1 ABY, psychotic cave-dwellers captured two groups of hikers in the Thaos Mountains. Ilyamo and other hikers were kept as hostages in the cave. Commander Talte of the Corellian Security Force therefore hired a spacer to investigate the disappearances of the hikers. The spacer fought several cave-dwellers at the spot where the second group disappeared. From a communicator found on a body, the spacer managed to triangulate a signal to the cave. The CorSec finally assaulted the cave and freed the hostages.

The psychotic cave-dwellers' cave appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The cave was added to the game with the release of the "Publish 28", on April 26, 2006.
